title: Week 17 Power Rankings: 1-32 poll, plus every team's rookie of the year
description: How high did the Cowboys rise and how far did the Eagles fall? Plus, we pick rookies of the year on every team.
author: NFL Nation

title: Rodgers on potential Jets return: 'Ask Woody'
description: Quarterback Aaron Rodgers offered an unusually curt response Tuesday when asked about Jets owner Woody Johnson -- boosting the perception of a rift between them.
author: Rich Cimini

title: 'Self-doubt, errors & big changes' - inside the crisis at Man City
description: As Pep Guardiola and Manchester City's current crisis continues, Spanish football expert Guillem Balague takes a look at their issues - and potential solutions.

title: How Sir Alex Ferguson built his last great Manchester United side
description: A new documentary explores the genius of Sir Alex Ferguson and looks at his greatest achievements in the game.

title: Merry mock draft! Giants take QB at No. 1, while the best player goes No. 2
description: Cam Ward or Shedeur Sanders in New York? Does Ashton Jeanty squeeze into the first round? Check out our latest projections.

title: 2024 NFL Christmas Day: How to watch the Chiefs vs. Steelers game
description: Here's how to watch the Chiefs vs. Steelers game on Christmas Day.

title: Amorim: Man Utd are maybe in one of their lowest moments
description: Ruben Amorim has admitted Manchester United are suffering "maybe one of their lowest moments" and has called for everyone – including the exiled Marcus Rashford – to be "strong in the moment".

title: Cross and Chisnall suffer shock exits in marathon Ally Pally session
description: Dave Chisnall crashed out of the World Darts Championship after suffering a dramatic final-leg loss to Ricky Evans, while former world champion Rob Cross was also dumped out in a remarkable session at Alexandra Palace.
